thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 5 of 158
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
Honestly I was really really skeptical at first, then they said it was shipping from HONG KONG, my skepticality got worse! I wanted a refund when I got the word of where it was comming from!
Also I would like to add that I live in Hawaii and I received it in about a week in a half!
I would probably order again just because I had a good first experience! I'm very glad I did and I feel for the people that haven't! But like always I'm always skeptical!
PAY THROUGH PAY PAL
That way a least you can get your money back!
Hope this helps!!!
